mapper.select: SELECT A.APPL_NO, B.ADMS_FEE, C.PAY_SEQ FROM APPL A LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_PAY C ON A.APPL_NO = C.APPL_NO AND C.PAY_STS_CODE = '00001', ADMS_CORS B WHERE A.ADMS_NO = B.ADMS_NO AND A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE AND IFNULL(A.ARI_INST_CODE,'') = IFNULL(B.ARI_INST_CODE,'') AND A.CORS_TYPE_CODE = B.CORS_TYPE_CODE AND A.APPL_NO = #{applNo,jdbcType=INTEGER};
